Text.Page:
I understand you soldiers have more important things to do, but the situation has gotten so bad, you must help me.

The gulas inflict wounds that fester almost instantly. I need to make an ointment bandage to stop the wounds from becoming infected. I'll need Shetla Fibers to do it.

You can find soft fiber all throughout the maze, or you can buy some from other people.
I know plant-gathering isn't exactly what the recruiter promised you, but you're saving your comrades' lives, <PCNAME>. Thanks!
I need more <font color='#660000'>shetla fiber</font>, <PCNAME>. It's that simple.
